Patient 37: Patient 37 is a 48-year-old female with a history of major depressive disorder and chronic migraines. She is currently on sertraline for depression and sumatriptan as needed for migraines. Her medication regimen has been adjusted several times in the past due to side effects, including a switch from fluoxetine to sertraline. Her family history includes depression and anxiety disorders. She reports no known allergies.
